name: RETURN_TO_CPB
description: Table for the Return to Cardiopulmonary Bypass Reason (I ORG 3008) item.

columns.name: ORG_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the organ record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: WHY_POST_TXP_CPB_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the reason why the transplant recipient needed to return to cardiopulmonary bypass support after the cardiothoracic transplant surgery.
